abstract: One year and two bailouts later, with the financial industry on the mend, Bank of America announced several measures on Monday to reduce its reliance on federal aid and to extricate itself from Washington’s grip.
snippet: One year and two bailouts later, with the financial industry on the mend, Bank of America announced several measures on Monday to reduce its reliance on federal aid and to extricate itself from Washington’s grip.
lead_paragraph: One year and two bailouts later, Bank of America is moving to extricate itself from Washington’s grip.

headline.main: BofA Moves to Reduce Dependence on Aid
